name: Mary 3x
content: Getting higher than the Bee gees
Some try that sh*t for nothing
So many went down the wrong road
So homie you can too you can too
Just give me w**d and my joint
The same way I came into the game
And my homies smoke like I smoke
Say they be smoking they be acting
Cause you ain't yet really smoked
High as choked up in my cabin
Got some OG from a fan
So we Taylored all my smoke papers
Some try that sh*t for nothing
So many went down the wrong road
Just give me w**d and my joint
The same way I came into the game
